Text: Sounds interesting. If you coulda put all these 20MB files in ONE torrent I mifgt've even downloaded'em.

pictures are Ok, and I appreciate you taking the time to upload many different SMALLish uploads

I - for one - cant be bothered to download a 'several hundred' or 'gigabyte' file size picture file.

i much prefer taking a few small chunks, rather than a huge bite all at once
